briefTitle: Study of Eryaspase in Combination With Chemotherapy Versus Chemotherapy Alone as 2nd-Line Treatment in PAC
officialTitle: A Randomized, Phase 3 Study of Eryaspase in Combination With Chemotherapy Versus Chemotherapy Alone as 2nd-Line Treatment of Patients With Pancreatic Adenocarcinoma

interventions.name: Irinotecan plus 5-FU plus leucovorin
otherNames: Onivyde, liposomal irinotecan, Camptosar, Campto, Adrucil, Carac, Efudex, Efudix, folinic acid, calcium folinate

summary: This is an open-label, multicenter, randomized, Phase 3 study in patients with ductal adenocarcinoma of the pancreas who have failed only one prior line of systemic anti-cancer therapy for advanced pancreatic cancer and have measurable disease.
